S0.name: Baseline
S0.description: Idealized domain: 4×4 grid buildings - aligned, uniform 16 m building height, 16 m street width, urban canyon aspect ratio of 1, concrete buildings, asphalt ground, LCZ 5.
S0.primaryAnalysisFocus: Establish reference for fluxes, environmental conditions, and comfort metrics.

S1_1.name: Tall Canyon
S1_1.primaryAnalysisFocus: Impact of Urban Canyon Aspect Ratio, Sky View Factor (SVF), mutual shading, and wind flow on canyon climate.

S1_2.name: Wide Canyon
S1_2.primaryAnalysisFocus: Impact of lower Urban Canyon Aspect Ratio, higher SVF, and increased solar access on surface heating.

S1_3.name: Staggered Layout
S1_3.description: Building Alignment: Aligned grid → Staggered grid.
S1_3.primaryAnalysisFocus: Changes in wind channeling and ventilation in canyons, surface temperatures.

S1_4.name: Building Materials: Glass
S1_4.primaryAnalysisFocus: Effect of shortwave and longwave radiation, heat storage, surface temperatures.

S1_5.name: Building Materials: Green Façade
S1_5.description: Building Walls: Concrete → Green walls on all façades.
S1_5.primaryAnalysisFocus: Cooling from evapotranspiration (Qₑ), surface temperatures, longwave radiation.

S2_1.name: High Albedo Pavement
S2_1.primaryAnalysisFocus: Effect of albedo on surface temperature, radiation balance (Q*), and stored heat (ΔQₛ).

S2_2.name: Sandy Loamy Ground
S2_2.description: Street Material: Asphalt → Sandy Loam soil.
S2_2.primaryAnalysisFocus: Impact of changing from impervious to pervious surface, allowing for cooling from evapotranspiration (Qₑ), ground temperatures at different levels.

S3_1.name: Grass Cover
S3_1.primaryAnalysisFocus: Impact of a low, continuous vegetative cover on surface temperature and latent heat flux (Qₑ).

S3_2.name: Hedges
S3_2.description: Vegetation: Add 1 m high hedges along streets.
S3_2.primaryAnalysisFocus: Effects of low, dense vegetation on near-ground wind flow, shading, and local humidity.

S3_3.name: Deciduous Trees
S3_3.description: Vegetation: Add 6 m deciduous trees along streets.
S3_3.primaryAnalysisFocus: Effect of shading and evapotranspiration from tree canopies on canyon climate.

S3_4.name: Evergreen Trees
S3_4.description: Vegetation: Add 6 m evergreen trees along streets.
S3_4.primaryAnalysisFocus: Effect of shading and evapotranspiration from tree canopies on canyon climate.

S4_1.name: Mist Nozzles
S4_1.description: Water Feature: Add an active misting/spray system.
S4_1.primaryAnalysisFocus: Intensive, localized evaporative cooling; impact on air temperature and humidity.

S4_2.name: Urban Pond
S4_2.description: Water Feature: Add a shallow water pond.
S4_2.primaryAnalysisFocus: Cooling from evaporation and the effect of water’s high thermal inertia.
